name: looK INside
description:
FACE YOUR FEARS

During the unseasonally harsh winter of 1981, a shocking discovery was made in the sleepy town of Hemlock, Vermont, population, just 56. The frozen body of a young woman, whom no one could identify. Stranger still, the manner of her death seemed to match that of an ancient ritual supposedly practiced in the area hundreds of years before.
Look Inside is a gripping psychological thriller kinetic novel. Take control of Vermont State Detective David Parker as you investigate the case, search for clues, and ultimately answer the question: who was Dwale County Jane Doe?
